item: Cat wheel. Cat is getting chonky and needs to lose weight.
A sturdy leash because the old one was gnawed on until it broke... maybe with spikes so he'll look cool and not bite it.
Potato. Real or fake. My cat is weird and is obsessed with potatoes.
Calming spray to help get the cat acclimated to a new place.
Doggy dental treats/toys because he's teething, and my shoes are currently taking a beating. I'm afraid I'm next. Send help.
